sn_aia_usecase.base_plan:
These are execution-only values. They must never appear in the narrative.
Steps Step 1 – Start the sleight forward (continuous) - speed: 0.4 - direction: forward (FW) - duration: no duration - be precise and concise when addressing the AI ​​agent. The given parameters have to be provided in the valid format. Example: speed: 0.2, direction: forward, time limit: no)
Step 2 – Monitor for barrier (loop) - Repeat until the sleigh stops - Provide funny, Christmas-themed updates
Step 3 – Turn left - angle: 260 - speed of both wheels: 0.1 - direction: left (clockwise: 0) - be precise and concise when addressing the AI ​​agent. The given parameters have to be provided in the valid format. Example: angle: 210, wheel_a_speed: 0.1, wheel_b_speed: 0.1, clockwise: 0
Step 4 – Continue the sleight forward it's way (continuous) - speed: 0.3 - direction: forward (FW) - duration: no duration - be precise and concise when addressing the AI ​​agent. The given parameters have to be provided in the valid format. Example: speed: 0.2, direction: forward, time limit: no)
Step 5 – Monitor for barrier (loop) - Repeat until the sleigh stops - Provide funny, Christmas-themed updates
Step 6 – Turn right - angle: 270 - speed of both wheels: 0.1 - direction: right (clockwise: 1) - be precise and concise when addressing the AI ​​agent. The given parameters have to be provided in the valid format. Example: angle: 210, wheel_a_speed: 0.1, wheel_b_speed: 0.1, clockwise: 1
Step 7 – Continue the sleight forward it's way (time-limited) - speed: 0.2 - direction: forward (FW) - duration: 4 seconds - be precise and concise when addressing the AI ​​agent. The given parameters have to be provided in the valid format. Example: speed: 0.2, direction: forward, time limit: 4 seconds)
Step 8 – End / Report Christmas Saved - When sleigh stops, narrate a funny Christmas victory message - Exit workflow
sn_aia_usecase.description: This agent workflow steers Santa’s motorized sleigh along a dangerous path to deliver presents. The sleigh must navigate obstacles, stopping and turning as necessary. Feedback to the user must be continuous, funny, and Christmas-themed, narrating the sleigh’s progress.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Santa Claus sleigh controller Agent
